channel.title: Comments on: The Future of Web Apps – filling up fast

item.title: By: Mel Kirk
item.dc:creator: Mel Kirk
item.description: Thanks for the kind words guys - we're really looking forward to it, it's going to be such fun and we're so pleased that you're able to make it!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the kind words guys – we’re really looking forward to it, it’s going to be such fun and we’re so pleased that you’re able to make it!

item.title: By: Jan Blanchard
item.dc:creator: Jan Blanchard
item.description: A common stand at Fonwa and Web2.0 Berlin is a great initiative. There's a definite interest from us, at Tourist Republic.
item.content:encoded: A common stand at Fonwa and Web2.0 Berlin is a great initiative. There’s a definite interest from us, at Tourist Republic.

item.title: By: Daniel Becker
item.dc:creator: Daniel Becker
item.description: Sounds like a great idea. GlowDay are going to the gig anyway so it could work out well.
item.content:encoded: Sounds like a great idea. GlowDay are going to the gig anyway so it could work out well.

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: Definite interest in a joint stand from LouderVoice
item.content:encoded: Definite interest in a joint stand from LouderVoice

item.title: By: Lenny
item.dc:creator: Lenny
item.description: PollDaddy would be interested. FOWA is a really good gig.
item.content:encoded: PollDaddy would be interested. FOWA is a really good gig.
